title: Elastic Copilot
author: Andrew Mikhov
excerpt: Elastic Copilot is an AI agent for VS Code that codes end‑to‑end. It plans and writes features, understands huge codebases, fixes bugs, writes docs and runs browser, terminal and CI tasks. Built on Claude, GPT and Gemini; full‑context coding.
text: Elastic Copilot is an AI agent for VS Code that codes end‑to‑end. It plans and writes features, understands huge codebases, fixes bugs, writes docs and runs browser, terminal and CI tasks. Built on Claude, GPT and Gemini; full‑context coding.
html: Elastic Copilot is an AI agent for VS Code that codes end‑to‑end. It plans and writes features, understands huge codebases, fixes bugs, writes docs and runs browser, terminal and CI tasks. Built on Claude, GPT and Gemini; full‑context coding.
